name: WILDER clay born simulator
description:
** Very Much a wip **

You're trying to prove your worth as a beginner potter, try to make the most points and earn an internship!

In this demo:

2 minutes of gameplay.

I may have had some fun with trying some animation more than... gameplay.

But there's a few different pots to make, and a fun lil animated-ish intro.

The next update will include : easier to read text colors, position of the hands, among more pots and some ranking system to compete with npcs and learn new methods!

One man team, made for the Jamulator 2021
